verbose_text: Further, sitagliptin decreased the mRNA expression of iNOS in a model of ovalbumin induced murine model of allergic airway disease [XREF_BIBR] and it also reduced the key downstream executioner caspase-3 expression in a recent study showing the ability of sitagliptin to attenuate transient cerebral I/R injury in diabetic rats [XREF_BIBR].
